doc.description: MS45XX Driver for differential pressure (airspeed) measurements. Based on I2C

define.name: MS45XX_OUTPUT_TYPE
define.description: set to 0 for output type A, to 1 for output type B

define.name: MS45XX_SYNC_SEND
define.description: flag to enable sending every new measurement via telemetry (default:FALSE)

define.name: MS45XX_PRESSURE_SCALE
define.description: pressure scaling factor to convert raw output to Pa (default: set according to pressure range and output type according to datasheet)

define.name: MS45XX_PRESSURE_OFFSET
define.description: pressure offset in Pa (default: set according to pressure range and output type according to datasheet)

define.name: MS45XX_AIRSPEED_SCALE
define.description: quadratic scale factor to convert differential pressure to airspeed

define.name: USE_AIRSPEED
define.description: flag to use the data for airspeed control
